title: Case-Based Workshop for Coaching Culture Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of organizational development and mathematics education experience
context.additional_context: A course to strengthen coaching culture introduction and operational competencies for mathematics education field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three key elements (leadership motivation, relationship management, role modeling) to consider when designing a coaching culture within an organization.
Learners can propose at least two strategies for implementing a coaching culture suitable for mathematics education settings through case analysis.
Learners can create a coaching culture design plan through project-based learning and improve it by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
